contents.text: old kit, will get a rework someday
Damage taken passively accumulates, up to 10 hearts. When it's over 4 hearts, you can use R on a teammate to heal them by the amount of accumulated damage.

Buffs resistance and knockback resistance for a teammate by 40% for 6 seconds (look at them and press Q). Additionally, team members in a 4.5 block radius around the buffed player recieve 20% less damage.
Creates a Projectile Shield that lasts 7.5 seconds.
